help.text: â„¹ï¸ How to Use Flipflop Mint Bot: ğŸ’³ Wallet Management: â€¢ Generate Wallets - Create new Solana wallets â€¢ My Wallets - View and manage existing wallets ğŸª™ Token Operations: â€¢ Mint Tokens - Create new tokens â€¢ Token Data - View detailed token information ğŸ’¸ Transfer Functions: â€¢ Send SOL - Transfer SOL tokens â€¢ Send SPL - Transfer SPL tokens ğŸ”§ Other Features: â€¢ Refund - Process refund operations â€¢ Get URC Info - Retrieve URC-related data â€¢ Settings - Configure language and network âš ï¸ Safety Reminders: ğŸ”’ Keep your private keys secure ğŸ’¾ Save wallet files safely ğŸ—‘ï¸ Delete sensitive information from chat
